name: Split Fantasy
description:
Split Fantasy is a 2D adventure game that showcases two unique mini games that the player can enjoy.

Mystic Dragon Battle

The first mini game Mystic Dragon Battle is a 2D top-down third person action shooter game. The player takes the role of the dragon and plays from the dragon’s perspective while the dragon is dreaming, the player’s goal is to defeat the knights that the dragon dreams about.

 Using W, A, S, D keys the player can move and left click to shoot.

Knights Crown

The second mini game Knights crown is a 2D platformer game that challenges the players' thinking and timing as the level begins to increase in speed as time goes on. The world is set in a dungeon like design with projectiles being thrown at the player every few seconds, the player takes on the role of a knight lost in the dungeon with the sole objective to survive and make it out alive. 

The knight player must use A, D, S and space to dodge, jump and duck under projectiles using the walls to jump over any projectiles that the player can’t duck or jump over.
